name: Eastman Chemical Company
membership: Eastman is a member of Cefic, VCI, VNCI, essenscia, AmCham Belgium and Netherlands, ECPA, ACC and other small Trade Associations.
goal: Eastman is a global specialty chemical company that produces a broad range of advanced materials, additives and functional products, specialty chemicals, and fibers that are found in products people use every day. As a world leader in the diverse markets it serves, Eastman is focused on delivering innovative and technology-based solutions while maintaining its commitment to safety and sustainability.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Trade, Environment,  Energy , Sustainable Development, Taxation and Customs
